items.content:
JOB TYPE: Full time

EXPERIENCE: beginner

COMPANY: Aurity; 10-50 employees; 75-100% remote;

We are Aurity, a cutting-edge team with a great passion for development, always looking for new solutions and the best technology. We work with clients from all around the world who have projects that keep us motivated and help us to learn and constantly grow. We support huge startups similar to Uber and Monzo in developing web, mobile apps and backends.

If you’re looking for a new role, which includes Direct Sales, Account Management and Lead Generation this one could be for you! We have been extremely successful in providing solid solutions to our clients and pairing them with the best developers.

We’re looking for a open minded, positive and willing to learn person. You will provide complete and appropriate solutions for every customer in order to boost top-line revenue growth, customer acquisition levels and profitability. You will learn how to :

Seek out new leads, providing us with solid clients who require the assistance of developers.
Present, promote and sell technical products/services using solid arguments to existing and prospective customers
Perform cost-benefit and needs analysis of existing/potential customers to meet their needs
Establish, develop and maintain positive business and customer relationships
Reach out to customer leads through conferences, meetups, cold calling and emailing.
Take part in sales and strategic account management on projects ranging from £50k - £500k, to accelerate the company’s growth
Achieve agreed upon sales targets and outcomes within schedule
Coordinate sales effort with team members and other departments
Analyse the territory/market’s potential, track sales and status reports
Supply management with reports on customer needs, problems, interests, competitive activities, and potential for new products and services.
Keep abreast of best practices, promotional trends and technology
Generating and following up new leads, sales and ensuring customer loyalty through excellent account management.
Following up new business opportunities and setting up meetings, planning and preparing presentations/proposals
Maintains internal CRM and meets minimum data standards
REQUIREMENTS

You are positive, open minded, target driven person
Passionate about the value add of technology to the business world
Have knowledge of React, React Native, Node, Elixir and other cutting-edge technologies.
Familiarity with BRM and CRM practices along with ability to build productive business professional relationships
Highly motivated and target driven with a proven track record in sales preferably with projects above £50k
Excellent communication and negotiation skills
Prioritizing, time management and organizational skills
upcoming/ soon to be BS/BA
Ability to do market research and acquire knowledge and understanding of market Organisations and planning skills
Negotiating and influencing skills
You want to be a driven sales person, comfortable with selling in person, over the phone or email. Willing and ready to pick up a completely cold desk and turn clients in to tangible, high- returning partners.
BENEFITS

Get valuable work experience while still studying
A great opportunity for professional development within a innovative and fast growing company.
The opportunity to work within a dynamic company with a start-up culture.
Remote working
For additional benefits take a look at our blog.

items.title: Sales Account Executive (German speaker)
items.content:
InVision is the Digital Product Design platform used to make the world’s best customer experiences. We provide design tools and educational resources for teams to navigate every stage of the product design process, from ideation to development.

Today, more than 3.5 million people use InVision to create a repeatable and streamlined design workflow; rapidly design and prototype products before writing code, and collaborate across their entire organization. That includes more than 80 percent of the Fortune 100, and organizations like Airbnb, Amazon, HBO, Netflix, Nike, Slack, Starbucks and Uber, who are now able to design better products, faster.

InVision is a fully distributed company with employees in 25 countries around the world. The company has raised more than $235 million in funding from leading investors including Accel, ICONIQ, FirstMark, Tiger Global, Battery Ventures, and Spark Capital. Visit us at InVisionApp.com and InVisionApp.com/blog.

We're looking for an Enterprise Account Executive to capitalize on our growing global footprint, and own our DACH presence as she/he accelerates rapid growth of our Enterprise sales efforts in EMEA.

*Requirements*

*5 years or more of inside sales experience in a B2B SaaS vertical
*Proven track record exceeding quota
*Referenceable executive-level customers at Fortune 2000 companies, major digital agencies and prominent tech firms
*Rolodex of contacts in leadership roles in design, product, marketing, UX or user research
*Passion, enthusiasm, energy, humor, and the ability to convey this through phone and email communications
*High degree of comfort with outbound calling
*Bias towards immediate action and results
*Willingness to learn and adapt
*Skilled multi-tasker who can wear multiple hats
*Passion for design
*Fluent German speaker
Responsibilities:

Be a visible presence for InVision in EMEA, inclusive of conferences, client and prospect onsites, networking events and the overall design community
Focus on expanding relationships with existing EMEA customers and driving net new prospect acquisition
Manage full sales cycle in a consultative manner, from initial qualification through product demo through follow up calls to closing
Develop new business opportunities through proactive efforts, in addition to handling incoming leads
Drive strategic direction of InVision sales and customer success presence in EMEA
Manage against company revenue targets
Potential to build broader team to support EMEA growth

items.title: Social Media Manager
items.content:
Exciting new startup in the process of raising equity funding is looking to bring on a Social Media Manager.

The company is bringing a popular existing game into the 21st century by integrating cryptocurrency and blockchain technology. The role will be part time initially, with the opportunity to be brought on full time. Remote working accepted for the initial stage.

Ideally the candidate will be as follows:
- Has knowledge/interest in the cryptocurrency/blockchain space
- Has the will to play a key role in the success of the company
- Is a self-starter and can work without major supervision
- Experienced in managing different social media channels
- Experienced in coming up with innovative ideas for campaigns
- Experienced in creating visuals for said social media campaigns (or at least the ideas for said ideas)

On offer is:
- The chance to be part of an exciting company
- The opportunity to work alongside smart, like minded people
- The opportunity to share ideas as a key member of the team
- The opportunity to eventually build your own team

Compensation is negotiable. Good short and long term earning opportunities.

Please apply to this role mentioning previous experience, your knowledge of crypto, why you think you would be the best person for the role and one thing of your choice which may convince us you are the right person.

Staff Accountant at Shortfundly

Chennai, Remote · Internship
Shortfundly is an online media company that curates and shares the best short films and stories from india through our global multi-platform network. Our video and editorial platform enables a global audience to easily discover, watch and share unique stories from india anywhere on their desktop and mobile devices.Read More

Shortfundly is an online media company that curates and shares the best short films and stories from india through our global multi-platform network. Our video and editorial platform enables a global audience to easily discover, watch and share unique stories from india anywhere on their desktop and mobile devices.

Our vision is to continually grow the community of short film audience to enable a wide and accessible market reach for short films and become the leading micro-cinema/shortfilm platform for india.

Applied
Apply to Shortfundly
Add a message to Shortfundly
Apply

Job Description

Shortfundly would be place for you, if you love the following in any particular order:
a. Movies
b. Accounts
c. Startup culture

Shortfundly.com is creating a digital revolution in Shortfilm Industry. The online shortfilm sharing portal (shortfundly) start collecting 22,000+ short films to different shortfilm categories from new age filmmakers. This portal will also use its contacts to promote the films in the shortfilm festival circuit. Shortfundly shares plenty of new films every day. We are bootstrap company. So, you are not only part of team, you are part of the company.

Skills & Prerequisites:

Knowledge of accounting theory, principles and practices
Microsoft Office proficiency
Strong priority management skills
Ability to describe accounting systems and processes in written correspondence and in procedure manual format.
Ability to prepare statistical reports and analyze financial reports.
Ability to perform mathematical computations accurately and quickly.
Ability to identify and compute ratios and percentage

Financial Duties:

Reconciles bank and credit card accounts monthly
Codes all transactions by name and account
Manages accounts receivables and accounts payables
Maintains historical records by filing documents electronically
Prepares financial reports by collecting, analyzing, and summarizing account information and trends as requested
Works with respective Controller/Account Manager in forecasting income and expenses
Complies with federal, state, and local legal requirements by maintaining compliance documentation for each client
Prepare financial reports monthly for each client for review by respective Controller/Account Manager
Works with respective sales team monthly to close books

items.content:
JIRA Requirements Coordinator and Manager (m/f)

About this job

Job type: Full-time
Experience level: Mid-Level, Senior
Industry: Information Technology
Company size: 5k-10k people
Company type: Private
Company: HERE North America LLC | Berlin, Germany

Remote details

Office Location: Berlin, Germany. Employees can also work full time from this office.
Relocation Assistance: Yes

Technologies

jira
scripting
ibm-doors
atlassian
jira-rest-api

Job description

Ever checked in somewhere on social media? Ever tracked your online orders?" You might be using HERE Technologies every single day without even realizing it. You can find us everywhere: in vehicles, smartphones, drones or third-party apps. We believe that with the right people, we will continue to be a game-changer in the technology industry and improve the daily lives of people around the world.
Find out more by clicking the video:





We are looking for an energetic and creative Jira Administrator to expand our Automotive Bid Preparation team.

As a key member of the Bid Preparation team, you will support the technical coordination, creation & submission of our Automotive solution offerings towards our OEM customer by taking care of the E2E Requirements Management. For this purpose, you will use existing industry standards as well as HERE internal tools to enable HERE to answer on customer requirements with internally used tools and processes.

You will become the main expert on operational challenges of requirement management. You will create solutions for new challenges ad-hoc leveraging existing tools and your knowledge

Main Responsibilities:
  • Requirement Document Support:
    • Convert received RFQ documents in HERE internal document format (JIRA and/or MS Excel) for further processing within RFQ answering team
    • Importing documents in JIRA for tracking purpose
    • First pass of clustering RFQ documents to point RFQ line-items to specific HERE internal teams
  • Requirement Management and RFQ Analysis:
    • Support the product teams in tracking the status of the current implementation of features
    • Compare RFQ requirements to committed / dropped features and provide overview of RFQ feature compliance
  • Project Reporting
    • Creating customer project reports
    • Develop automated reporting and processes in JIRA and DOORs to decrease workload for Product Owners and the Program




Qualifications:
  • Requirements management experience preferably in an automotive sector
  • Experience with Python Script Language, VBA, Excel, Eclipse IDE or similar scripting languages.
  • Experience with IBM rational Doors or similar requirements management tools.
  • Experience with Atlassian JIRA preferably using JIRA REST API or programming expertise to manipulate database entries and fill databases based on a variety of sources as well as working with reporting tools.
  • Capability of creating solutions under pressure and within short time
  • Work independent and autonomously keeping tough deadlines in mind
  • Bachelors or higher degree in Computer Science preferred.






What we offer:
  • This role will give you an opportunity to work with multiple stakeholders within the HERE cross functional teams and continuously improving the re-usability, quality and turnaround time of our bids.
  • Public Transport Subsidy
  • Free German classes


Make HERE your destination, we are just getting started! Apply now!

Apply now

Benefits

  • Paid Vacation
  • Flexible working hours
  • Free cold/ warm drinks and fruits
  • Competitive salary plus bonus
  • Fantastic & talented people from 60+ countries worldwide
  • BVG Company Ticket
  • On-Site Massage
  • Gaming Room
  • Office Gym & Sauna, Football, Beach Volleyball (in Summer)
  • Brown Bag Talks, Team Events (e.g. BBQ on the rooftop)

Job Description

This is a business development role working with the digital media agency & publishers industry. Meaning you need to talk great and write great, and most importantly, make agencies, media and publishers subscribe for Lobster.

Lobster is looking for a person experienced in working with (or better off within!) digital media, advertising agencies and creatives of all sorts. This is a very important role for us great dedication and a share option in the company, it is almost a co-founder role.

We have developed an outstanding tool for the agencies and publishers to find exactly right social media visual content and license it for work from the authors. Now we are turning it into the whole world’s honest place to access real people’s content and it’s your turn to come on stage and reach all the agencies that need it.

Launched on TechCrunch Disrupt Battlefield Europe 2014, Graduate of Wayra UK accelerator 2014, raised £1m in 2017, reached 10 million photos and videos immediately available with the help of AI, first great agency subscribers and brands – waiting for you to grow the UK & European customer side!

We can only consider people in London and settled in the UK to join the team at this time, even though you may be in office only occasionally.

Marketing and Business Development Assistant at TrySome

Brooklyn, Remote · Internship
These are early days at TrySome. If you like getting things off the ground, this is for you.Read More

These are early days at TrySome. If you like getting things off the ground, this is for you.

We are working on a mission that can make significant change in the world, now that's serious, but we are not serious!
Come have fun and help us build something incredible together.

TrySome is an innovative online marketplace for health-conscious consumers to discover products that are good for people and better for the planet. Our goal is to connect consumers with brands by online sampling in exchange for their feedback and comments. The products can then be purchased in full size at great discounts.

We are an asset to our manufacturing clients through the accurate and authentic consumer data we create at low cost with a quick turnaround. The data and feedback we provide is valuable information manufacturers use to improve and market their goods.

We lower the financial barriers for people to buy the products that match their health and environmental values while helping manufacturers of responsibly made products thrive.

Applied
Apply to TrySome
Add a message to TrySome
Apply

Job Description

We are looking for a communicative rock star with a passion and willingness to make things happen. If you can't wait to write captivating copy, we can't wait to hear from you.

YOU:
We are looking for an intelligent creative person with excellent verbal and written communication skills to join our Marketing and Communications team.
An interest in organic, vegan and fair-trade products is definitely a plus, but don’t lie about it, it’s not more important than being real.

THE JOB:
You will have the opportunity to work on a variety of digital media and communications tasks including, but not limited to:

- Designing and implementing social media and email strategy to align with TrySome’s business goals
- Generate, edit and publish engaging social media content daily (e.g. original text, photos, videos and news)
- Conduct market research
- Send out email campaigns to our subscribers
- Monitor Google Analytics and web traffic metrics, adjusting social media and email campaigns accordingly to increase web traffic
- Communicate with TrySome subscribers and social media followers. Respond to customer service inquiries in a timely manner and monitor comments and reviews
- Initiate and implement new features to develop brand awareness, like promotions, Instagram challenge or competitions
- Initiate creative growth efforts to increase number of users and manufacturers on the platform

You should have basic understanding of SEO and set up KPIs to monitor progress. You will work directly with the Chief Marketing Officer for guidance.
This position is unpaid and requires a commitment of at least 3 full days per week, preferably full time. If you prove invaluable a full time position is a possibility. We prefer if you are in NYC and can come to the office, but working remotely is an option.

We are looking forward to hearing from you.

Application deadline & start date: Next internship starting in March. Apply asap. We will on-board the first right person.

TO APPLY:

Send us an email with:
- Your resume
- A writing sample (write a draft post for 2 of our 4 different social media platforms). For each post please explain why you think the particular post is good for that particular platform.

Visa Sponsorship
Not available
Applied
Apply Now
Add a message to TrySome
Apply

What We're Building

TrySome an innovative online marketplace for health-conscious consumers to discover products that are good for people and better for the planet. The products can be bought at great discounts, and samples are offered for free in exchange for feedback.

Our approach creates a new connection between consumers and manufacturers that removes the consumers’ risk of making a “wrong” choice and buying a product (which is oftentimes a more expensive choice) that they are not happy with - Try before you buy.

We offer manufacturers the ability to do smart sampling campaigns, which give them accurate and authentic data at low costs in a quick turnaround. We also track when people go from trying to buying products to show conversion trends.

The TrySome community is dedicated to help ethical companies become the brands of the future.
Our goal is to influence purchasing habits towards more responsibly made products, that will benefit the environment and drive positive change for ethical production.

International Sales at Talview

Bengaluru, Remote · Full Time

Do you like to disrupt the status quo and change the way work gets done? Then Talview is the place for you. We are all set for blazing the trail in the SaaS video interviewing space and have a burning desire to change the way recruitments are done. Founded by IIT Bombay alumni and Venture funded, Talview is among the first web based video interview solutions provider in whole of Asia and continues to innovate and gain large market share in this market .What you should expect? Joining our fast growing company means each new team member will have the accountability and opportunity to have a meaningful impact on our future growth and success. We are looking for quality talent with an entrepreneurial spirit to help us grow our market.

Applied
Apply to Talview
Add a message to Talview
Apply

Job Description

To apply for this post fill this form: https://appv4.talview.com/candidate/data/form?id=fe3

Who are we looking for?

We are looking for an energetic, disciplined and self-motivated individual to work with one of the fastest growing venture funded startups in Enterprise space ‘Talview’ as Inside Sales executive. The location will be Bangalore.

The ideal person must be energetic, ambitious, creative, performance-driven and one who believes that sky is the limit if they work hard. We offer a great compensation package: Fixed salary, monthly commissions, acceleration bonus, unlimited variable pay, awesome work culture and amazing growth.

The Sales Team is at the heart of Talview, forging into a newly emerging market with skill and a whole lot of strategy. The Sales team is focused on our clients' and prospects’ success with Digital Video Interviewing.
If you like it so far and intend to leave a mark in changing and making the world move closer to automation read on about some specifics about this role ->

Desired Skills -

• Experience in B2B selling in the International markets
• Proven ability to identify and develop new sales opportunities
• Knowledge of sales and marketing including selling principles and methods in order to promote solutions effectively
• The ideal candidate is entrepreneurial, creative, self-driven and highly analytical.
• Excellent verbal and written skills.
• Maintains a robust monthly sales pipeline
• Meets and exceeds monthly/ quarterly sales activities and revenue targets
• Listens carefully and effectively processes complex customer requirements on both a business and technical standpoints
• Communicate customers’ needs and issues to product management, marketing, and engineering teams

Mandatory Skills
• Minimum 1 Year in any form of international sales
• Willing to work in US Shift
• Passion for Technology & Sales
• Interacting with International customers


Location: HSR Layout, Bangalore

items.content:
Backend Developer (for our ROIBACK business)

About this job

Job type: Full-time
Experience level: Mid-Level
Role: Backend Developer
Industry: B2B, Information Technology, Travel & Tourism
Company size: 5k-10k people
Company type: Private
Company: The Hotelbeds Group | Palma, Spain

Remote details

Office Location: Palma, Spain. Employees can also work full time from this office.
Relocation Assistance: Yes

Technologies

javascript
python
sql
html5
linux

Job description

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES.


How can you help us?

We are seeking for top programmers and software architects to be part of our technology team.

As a software developer:


• As part of our booking engine team, implementing user stories with high business value using good techniques and practices.
• Helping the Product Ower in clarifying, prioritizing and estimating the user stories.
• Designing technical solutions and developing clear, testesable and efficient code, performing peer reviews with your collegueas.
• Ensuring continuous integration and build is in place.
• Collaborating with architects and other developers to produce just enough design and just enough technical documentation.
• Writing technical user stories for refactoring the existing code or implementing new technical features.

As a software architect:


• Doing some up front architecture envisioning to get started the developments in the right direction, collaboratively working with the team.
• Facilitating the architectural modeling and evolution efforts of our technological platform.
• Understanding of the business domain and communicating the architecture to developers and to other project stakeholders.
• Practising code review, pair programming and other agile techniques to improve the development team programming skills.
• Transitioning architectural skills to other team members

What can we offer you?


• To participate in very challenging projects with the top hotel chains from Europe, Asia and America, from the idea to the delivery.
• To work in a Company that invests (really invests) in technology.
• To be part of an Agile culture to obtain the best results in software development and to become a high-performance team, in a really happy environment.
• Work together with extremely passionate programmers, and being part of a top programmer community.
• To be part of a team-making decisions, to determine the technical roadmap of our platforms.
• To lead both business and technical projects from end-to-end.
• To live in the best city of the World

(http://www.thesundaytimes.co.uk/sto/style/homes_and_gardens/best_places/article1533629.ece)

CANDIDATE PROFILE.

• It is a must to hold a University degree in Engineering or Computing Sciences, or having completed at least 80%.
•  If you know Python or Go ... excellent! But what we are really looking for is a top programmer who loves technology and software development, and ready to learn any programming language that could be required.
• You have to feel comfortable working with databases (SQL and NoSQL), web programming (HTML5, CSS3, Javascript) and Linux environments.
• Good programming best-practices, such continuous integration, unit testing generation, code repositories, log management, code comments and documentation ...
• You will need to meet with the business to understand the needs and to translate them into code.
• You will be part of an agile team, so, what is really important in Roiback is the team success, not the individual success.
• It is not a must to have a lot of experience. For us, what is really important is the potential and attitude you have to become a great programmer

Apply now

About The Hotelbeds Group

Roiback.com

About us

We specialise in the development and management of online projects for hotel chains and independent hotels. We not only have a knack for all things digital, but we also have a knack for people. We know that the closer we are to you, the better and more adapted solutions we'll provide to your business. We have over 15 years experience in the industry, which has allowed us to develop a team of professionals who exceed in their fields. WHAT WE DO: We work with our partners to get to the nitty gritty of their business. This allows us to design custom-made solutions that deliver tangible results and provide a real answer to market demand. Our passion allows us to never stop improving our service and product offering, day in, day out. • Integrated Marketing Online Management. We help you build your brand differentiation in today’s crowded digital space. We have a flair for everything online and a real passion for the hospitality industry. Our method is quite simple: we first analyse your needs and then define action plans that make sense for you. We bring you a fresh approach to help you get the most out of your marketing spend, finding cost-effective ways to drive more traffic, and more bookings, to your website. • Web Design & Development. Our websites are specifically created for with the hotelier in mind. Designed to work on any device, strikingly beautiful and with a slick user experience. We are passionate about building websites that will engage visitors and drive conversions, taking direct channel sales to a new level. • Booking Engine for Hotels // BACKHOTEL 4.5 We specialise in creating technology that works for hoteliers. Our booking engine brings together beautiful design and seamless user experience to capture and convert your web traffic into bookings for your direct channel. • Technology We have direct integrations with the industry’s main Channel Managers and Property Management Systems to simplify the way you manage your direct channel.

Company details

Website

http://www.roiback.com

Headquarters

Palma de Mallorca, Islas Baleares

Year founded

2010

Company type

Privately Held

Company size

51-200 employees

Specialties

booking engine, web development, digital marketing, travel, tourism, web design, technology, and hotels

Benefits

  • To join our team
  • And enjoy all
  • We can offer

items.content:
Affiliate Manager

Worldwide
Company: Doubledot Media

FULL-TIME

Overview

Are you an experienced affiliate program manager, looking for an exciting new role with a lot of responsibility? Do you love keeping up with the latest trends in affiliate marketing or affiliate recruitment? Then we have the job for you!

We’re on the hunt for an experienced affiliate program manager to manage our fabulous affiliates and recruit even more fabulous affiliates!

What will you be doing?

  • Day-to-day management of affiliates, answering affiliate-related support questions, helping with issues and supporting them.
  • Regular communications with affiliates such as email newsletters, blog posts and webinars promoting our products.
  • Monitor affiliate activity, identify areas of improvement and give recommendations on ways to increase affiliate conversions.
  • Find and recruit new affiliates and strategic partners.
  • Oversee the development and distribution of promotional tools and creatives to affiliates.
  • Take on a variety of projects in this area as required.

You’ll need:

  • Excellent written English and a friendly manner in writing.
  • Meticulous attention to detail. Your spelling and grammar should be top notch.
  • Good time-management skills. Since this can be a remote working position, you’ll need to be organized, motivated, and (dare we say) a “self-starter”.
  • Proven experience (with evidence) recruiting new affiliates and influencers.
  • Knowledge of the ClickBank affiliate network or similar.
  • Prior experience with affiliate/search marketing or link-building campaigns.
  • A love of analytics and metrics, because they show off your superb talent.
  • Practical skills and knowledge of webinars/video interviews; how to script, run and promote them.
  • Confidence in using Photoshop as well as basic html/css skills.

Neat things about working with us:

  • Flexible hours.
  • Work from home (or from our Christchurch office).
  • Relaxed, ego-free, family-friendly work culture.
  • Need a few more reasons? Read what current and former staff have to say…

If you’d like to come work in our Christchurch office in Ferrymead, you also get:

  • Weekly Friday BBQ (or sushiBQ, or ThaiBQ).
  • Novelty coffee mugs.
  • An extremely comfortable chair.
  • Tap dancing seagulls.

How to apply

We’re going to level with you here: We usually get a lot of applications, and a lot of them are not very inspiring.

We’re looking for people with good problem-solving skills, good communication skills, and the willingness to go the extra mile, so here’s what you need to do.

  1. Record a short (2-3 minute) cover letter video and upload it somewhere where we can see it. Tell us a little bit about yourself, tools and sites you commonly use and why you think you’d be great for this role.
  2. Create an email addressed to jobs@doubledotmedia.com (Subject: Affiliate Marketing Position).
  3. Give us the link to your video inside the email.
  4. Attach your CV/resume in PDF format and send.

Apply for job

Business Development Director at ROIKOI

ROIKOI is a well-funded start-up with traction. We've built a software platform to help Fortune 5,000 companies hire more efficiently and improve diversity. We're hard-working but recognize that we have lives outside of work.

Applied
Apply to ROIKOI
Add a message to ROIKOI
Apply

Job Description

You excel at using clever, personal touches to prospect into an executive-level audience (VP and up). You're eager to join a fast-paced start-up with a great sales leader and to grow into a closing role. You're smart, hungry, and humble and excited about a low base, high uncapped commission, and generous equity.

As a Business Development Director, you will be responsible for setting meetings with executives. You will be involved in conversations with all levels of an organization and must use professional communication, research findings, and interviewing tactics, along with marketing and sales savvy to generate interest and opportunity. Ideal candidates have a successful track record in an inside sales, outbound phone/email heavy, demand generation, and market development role at a SaaS company.

Responsibilities:

- Set appointments with executives in the assigned territories to deliver sales opportunities.
- Build lead lists including phone number and email address based on target company profiles.
- Conduct calling/emailing campaigns to uncover & qualify leads through personalized outbound efforts.
- Qualify leads from inbound marketing campaigns.
- Follow up and nurture contacts with varying levels of interest.
- Document all activity and conversations into Hubspot CRM.
- Demonstrate ROIKOI products to prospects.
- Maintain proper reports and provide activity updates.

You're smart, hungry, and humble and excited about a high uncapped commission ($125K OTE), and generous equity.

items.title: Global Business Developer USA
items.content:
Who is the MOST inspiring person you know? What have they ACHIEVED that you really admire? Wouldn’t it be great if they would share their success secrets with YOU?

The obvious answer - YES - prompted us to embark on our mission, aiming to improve 10 million lives by 2022. By creating marketing campaigns, launching digital products or coaching our clients, PASSION.IO gives inspiring people the platform they deserve to share their message with the world and impact lives.

We are an international team with the majority of our customers in the US. We’ve grown from nothing to multi-million dollar business in under 2 years… because when you focus on impact, income will follow. We work together to not only make this company successful, but to transform our clients, our customers and ourselves into our best versions.

As we say, Do it with Passion, or not at all.

Do you think you’re the right fit?

We are looking for an inspiring, engaged and motivated new member for our business development team that proactively drives our US expansion and manages projects related to that.

You gained work experiences in high-paced environments and have the vision to change the future of learning.

Your mission will be to build and execute on various projects to market the Passion.io learning experience to millions of people anytime, anywhere. We work with social media celebrities with millions of followers. Working on key projects around them will be a relevant part of the job. Hence, past experience with project management, sales and strong execution skills would be beneficial. You will work in a cross-functional team to deliver high quality, outstanding work.

*What you'll be working on*
# You will analyze different verticals in the US, close partnerships, organize video productions, and build up deep functional expertise
# You work on product launches while consistently sounding out the market to help refine the products while monitoring and optimizing key performance indicators (KPIs)
# You will have ideas for further developing the products and business model, have a clear idea about the offers, and how they transform the market
# You will successfully drive projects through the lifecycle from conception to launch
# Define, structure, develop processes and tools, and show measurable results
# You will work on key projects in marketing, such as CRM, mobile, loyalty, and others to deliver high quality traffic, optimize conversion rates, and improve retention
# You will support implementing the marketing strategy and its roadmap across offers
# You will keep a close eye on the market, competition and use your research to continuously improve marketing activities
# You will identify and convert leads to active clients, including larger clients and strategic partnerships
# You will identify opportunities to further improve the sales processes, streamline operations and share best practices across markets

*What you'll bring to the team*
# Outstanding degree at a top university (likely: MBA, Wi-Ing or similar)
# Desirable: Prolonged stay abroad (> 6 months)
# You have exceptional analytic skills and a strong attention to detail as well as a hands-on mentality
# Preferably gained 2 years professional experience in high-performance environments (strategy consulting, banking, start-up, or similar)
# Proven track record of professional achievements
# Project management: You planned, implemented and controlled major projects, in particular extensive analytical, sales, and marketing work
# Preferably: supported internationalization, set up new business verticals

*What we offer you*
# Steep learning curve: Expect the steepest learning curve you have ever experienced - we are building a playground at passion.io to become the best version of ourselves. Meet and work with successful people worldwide to learn their success secrets.
# Value-based company: Be part of an open, honest, creative, and results-driven environment where your opinion is highly valued. We want to change the globe for the better by providing value to others.
# High-growth environment: You will be part of a strongly growing company with the opportunity to develop into a key contributor with incomparable responsibilities.
# Personal and professional development: You will tackle projects across departments and thereby gain a top-notch tool box to succeed in tackling bigger and bigger challenges.
# Autonomy / entrepreneurial work-style: You will only be measured by the results you produce and are in the driver’s seat, with full flexibility.
# Berlin: You will join our friendly and international team located in the heart of Berlin Mitte.

Training program that trains top talent in all dimensions of Passion’s business. Program candidates will gain inside perspectives, drive day-to-day management and build deep functional expertise by rotating every 3-6 months to new functional stages with different challenges.

Duration: 15 months total, fast track: 12 months depending on exceptional performance

Alumni will then build verticals globally from scratch to market leadership or become a key player in functions such as online marketing, product development, sales and operations.

You are responsible to excel in 6 modules. During the program, you will be assigned to a mentor you report to on a bi-weekly basis and direct responsible individuals (DRIs) for each program stage where you lead diverse projects to lift Passion’s business.

*What you'll be working on*
* Product Launch
# You work on product launches while consistently sounding out the market to help refine the products while monitoring and optimizing key performance indicators (KPIs)
# You will have ideas for further developing the products and business model, have a clear idea about the offers, and how they transform the market

# You will identify opportunities to further improve the sales processes, streamline operations and share best practices across markets
* Prep project for your new role
# In this module, you will identify and implement a complex project that prepares you for your new role

*What you'll bring to the team*
# Outstanding degree at a top university (likely: business administration, Wi-Ing or similar studies)
# Preferably gained professional experience in high-performance environments (strategy consulting, banking, start-up, small company or similar)
# Proven track record of professional achievements
# Project management: has planned, implemented and controlled major projects, in particular extensive analytical work
# Preferably: supported internationalization, set up new business verticals
# Google Suite or MS office, particularly strong in Spreadsheets and presentations
# Understanding of internet business models
# Extensive skills in project management
# Experience in business operations, background / experience in scaling internet companies

*What we offer you*
# Steep learning curve: Expect the steepest learning curve you have ever experienced - we are building a playground at passion.io to become the best version of ourselves. Meet and work with successful people worldwide to learn their success secrets.
# Value-based company: Be part of an open, honest, creative, and results-driven environment where your opinion is highly valued. We want to change the globe for the better by providing value to others.
# High-growth environment: You will be part of a strongly growing company with the opportunity to develop into a key contributor with incomparable responsibilities.

*What you'll be working on*
# Designing, executing and challenging the overall performance marketing strategy of the company and building up your own marketing team
# Taking the lead in performance-based marketing channels: Facebook, YT, Pinterest, SEA, SEO, GDN, Retargeting,
# Affiliate Marketing to reduce CPO

# Increase retention by onboarding, engaging, and locking the customer in our programs
# Deliver key projects that increase referrals

Paris, Europe, Remote · Cofounder

Job Description

Dataiku is looking for an experienced Account Executive whose native language is English to join our EU sales team (based in Paris or remotely) to focus on a large European territory. In addition to strong product-market fit, the territory benefits from extensive marketing and sales exposure over the past 18 months with significant latent demand.

The role consists of engaging prospects and customers on the topic of their Big Data and Advanced Analytics initiatives and to help them develop a more efficient approach, leveraging Dataiku DSS. The Account Executive is responsible for the entire sales cycle, leveraging various company resources, to reach a successful collaboration with the prospect.

Dataiku is a young company with great momentum and at this early stage, the Account Executive is likely to work cross-functionally with Marketing, Product Management and Engineering, and will be a key player in defining Dataiku's European strategy. We’re looking for someone who can express passion about the new technologies and possibilities of Big Data and Advanced Analytics.

Business Development at Shortfundly

Chennai, Remote · Internship
Shortfundly is an online media company that curates and shares the best short films and stories from india through our global multi-platform network. Our video and editorial platform enables a global audience to easily discover, watch and share unique stories from india anywhere on their desktop and mobile devices.Read More

Shortfundly is an online media company that curates and shares the best short films and stories from india through our global multi-platform network. Our video and editorial platform enables a global audience to easily discover, watch and share unique stories from india anywhere on their desktop and mobile devices.

Our vision is to continually grow the community of short film audience to enable a wide and accessible market reach for short films and become the leading micro-cinema/shortfilm platform for india.

Applied
Apply to Shortfundly
Add a message to Shortfundly
Apply

Job Description

Shortfundly would be place for you, if you love the following in any particular order:
a. Movies
b. Marketing
c. Startup culture

Shortfundly.com is creating a digital revolution in Shortfilm Industry. The online shortfilm sharing portal (shortfundly) start collecting 22,000+ short films to different shortfilm categories from new age filmmakers. This portal will also use its contacts to promote the films in the shortfilm festival circuit. Shortfundly shares plenty of new films every day. We are planning for big expansions in the future into other languages. We are bootstrap company. So, you are not only part of team, you are part of the company.

We will need you to pitch our Services/Solutions to the partners, close the deal and get them to align their services with our marketplace. Participates in periodic meetings and conference calls with partners to follow up business and define action plans.
You should have a good knowledge of Social Media websites, primarily facebook and linkedin. If you like making connections and spend most of your time on social media websites, this is your chance to earn while doing what you like the most.
Candidate should have experience in Business Development, Key Account Management. Build lasting partner relationships; identify the partners needs and expectations in order to be able to recommend solutions.

Skill set required :
1) Expert in oral and written English
2) Must possess strong presentation skills and be able to communicate professionally.
3) Ability to self-motivate and multi-task and work independently
4) Organisational communication, negotiation, and problem solving skills
5) Expert in dealing with International partners through mailing, calling, online research.
6) Talking to film festival events and acquire customers

Qualification:
1) Any Graduation or Post Graduation degree is required.
2) Part time Work.

How to Apply:
Mail your profile to support@shortfundly.com.

Skills
Business Intelligence, Business Development, Digital Media, Business Strategy, Sales, Sales Strategy and Management, Social Media Marketing, Business Operations, Customer Acquisition, User Acquisition, Sales and Marketing, New Business Development, Distribution and User Acquisition, User Acquisition Marketing, Entertainment, User Acquisition Strategy, user acquisition, engagement, and retention

We realised that we were not alone: how can our stories find its own voice among the noise?

This is the future of cinema and future of crowdfounding shortfilms

Sales Representative at Shortfundly

Chennai, Remote · Internship
Shortfundly is an online media company that curates and shares the best short films and stories from india through our global multi-platform network. Our video and editorial platform enables a global audience to easily discover, watch and share unique stories from india anywhere on their desktop and mobile devices.Read More

Shortfundly is an online media company that curates and shares the best short films and stories from india through our global multi-platform network. Our video and editorial platform enables a global audience to easily discover, watch and share unique stories from india anywhere on their desktop and mobile devices.

Our vision is to continually grow the community of short film audience to enable a wide and accessible market reach for short films and become the leading micro-cinema/shortfilm platform for india.

Applied
Apply to Shortfundly
Add a message to Shortfundly
Apply

Job Description

Shortfundly would be place for you, if you love the following in any particular order:
a. Movies
b. Sales
c. Startup culture

Shortfundly.com is creating a digital revolution in Shortfilm Industry. The online shortfilm sharing portal (shortfundly) start collecting 22,000+ short films to different shortfilm categories from new age filmmakers. This portal will also use its contacts to promote the films in the shortfilm festival circuit. Shortfundly shares plenty of new films every day. We are bootstrap company. So, you are not only part of team, you are part of the company.

This position is primarily inside sales, with aspects of lead generation, cultivation and management of leads, and assistance in onboarding of new accounts.

We are looking for candidates who are honest, personable, fast learners, and able to understand and clearly document the customer’s needs. Experience in B2B, B2C, software, and/or distribution of videos is preferred.

Skills
SaaS, Sales, Sales and Marketing, New Business Development, Cold Calling, New Business Launch, Sales Operations, Pre-Sales, Closing Deals, Sales Presentations, Video Distribution, Software and Technology sales, Online video, digital marketing & creative thinking, Sales Closing & Negotiating , Prospecting and Cold Calling, SaaS Sales
Compensation
No Salary

What We're Building

We are trying to get our ﬁlms out to a larger audience in a rich and diverse content Internet ecosystem.

We realised that we were not alone: how can our stories find its own voice among the noise?

As technology is a big part of our DNA, we embarked on this journey to enable the process of discovery for this generation of audiences: for local and regional films to be consumed locally, and to create a gateway for great Asian films for a global audience

With a growing audience to the ﬁlms, we aim to support both consumers and producers of film content in this thriving ecosystem.

This is the future of cinema and future of crowdfounding shortfilms

What We're Building

Evolation yoga is a training and support system for yoga students, teachers and studios worldwide backed by a collaborative of some of the most experienced teachers in the world. We allow our clients to combine the benefit of being an individual entrepreneur with the value of being part of a larger group. Our foundation is in hot yoga and we are expanding to create a union within the yoga world. We offer the best teacher trainings available in the market that helps our customers serve at the highest level in their local yoga community. Our customers range from people remotely interested in a yoga practice through the full spectrum of practice up to the teacher who has made their yoga life their living.

Our next project is developing an online platform for students and teachers to connect worldwide. We are ready to share all of this with a global community perfectly poised for the worlds first international yoga enterprise.

Senior B2B Sales at Language Zen

Stamford, Remote · Full Time

Language Zen is a distributed team with a hardworking, passionate culture. We call care about language learning and are exited to make the experience so much better.

Applied
Apply to Language Zen
Add a message to Language Zen
Apply

Job Description

We have a language learning product that's more than twice as effective as Rosetta Stone and our special architecture lets us quickly build out courses for specific professions like:

Spanish for medical workers
Spanish for law enforcement
Spanish for medical first response
Spanish for retail banking
Spanish for hospitality
Etc

We're looking for someone with experience selling into the HR training departments (or C Suits) of one or more of our target verticals.

You will need to be start-up minded. This will be our first sales position and you'll have a big role in forming and executing best practices in these areas. If you kick butt, we'll put together a larger team around you.

We are looking for this role to start out as largely commission based. As this will be a new B2B pipeline/process, initial commissions can be up to 50% of sales revenue.

Skills
Sales, Sales Strategy and Management, Product Development, Sales/Marketing and Strategic Partnerships, B2B Sales
Compensation
$24K–$80K

What We're Building

Currently cash flow breakeven, Language Zen is a language learning web app that uses machine learning to be the most quantifiably effective way to learn a new language. We are proven to teach 2.2X more effectively than Rosetta Stone, 1.4X more efficiently than Duolingo and can teach an entire semester's worth of Spanish in 25 hrs.

Our users can learn through music and explore their personal interests (like shopping or sports) and specific professional vocabulary.We also give learners the tools become conversationally fluent in topics like shopping or sports and specific professional vocabulary. We also data-mine real conversation to teach the things you're most likely to hear and use in the real world.

Users can even learn from real music.

Check us out at https://www.languagezen.com

Job Description

Do you enjoy the thrill of the hunt? Explain why Forkable is so awesome, close new customers, and help us on the front lines in our mission to conquer the world! As sales rep, you need to have excellent phone and email manners. You need to understand our service completely so you can explain it to folks who'd like to try it out. If you're good with people and you believe Forkable is rad, this is very fun, fulfilling position!

Compensation

Forkable is using AI to conquer the 834B global lunch market. It figures out what you want for lunch before you know it, automatically delivering the best local restaurants to your whole office. A unique copay system makes Forkable accessible to companies with a wide variety of budgets.

By solving the group ordering problem we are able to source from a wide variety of local restaurants with 20x lower delivery costs than normal.

Enterprise Account Executive, New York at MemSQL

New York City, Remote · Full Time
MemSQL is a Y-Combinator, SF-based startup that is leading the next wave of big data. MemSQL's real-time database is the fastest performing and most scalable database for transactions & analytics. Those early to take advantage include customers: Comcast, Boeing, Samsung, Zynga, etc.; Investors: NEA, Accel Partners, Khosla Ventures, In-Q-Tel; capitalizing MemSQL with almost $100M across just three tranches of investment and we’ve hardly scratched the surface.Read More

MemSQL is a Y-Combinator, SF-based startup that is leading the next wave of big data. MemSQL's real-time database is the fastest performing and most scalable database for transactions & analytics. Those early to take advantage include customers: Comcast, Boeing, Samsung, Zynga, etc.; Investors: NEA, Accel Partners, Khosla Ventures, In-Q-Tel; capitalizing MemSQL with almost $100M across just three tranches of investment and we’ve hardly scratched the surface.

MemSQL allows applications to run in-memory, scales horizontally on commodity hardware, and able to be deployed anywhere; both on-premise and in the cloud. MemSQL is built on a distributed system with a lock-free data structure able to ingest limitless amounts of data with zero downtime. Features include geospatial functionality, connectors & integrations allowing companies to combine semi-structured data all in one place.

MemSQL has an incredibly high-caliber team at one of the most exciting high-growth companies in tech. If you have the track record to be part of this elite team, we want to talk to you.

Applied
Apply to MemSQL
Add a message to MemSQL
Apply

Job Description

Position Overview
MemSQL is looking for an accomplished sales professional to join our Enterprise Sales Team. In this role you will be responsible for closing new business and expanding existing business with large enterprise customers in the tri-state region. This is an incredible opportunity to join an established, fast-growing startup in the enterprise software industry, where you will have the opportunity to over-achieve, earning uncapped commission and accelerators.

Enterprise Account Executives at MemSQL are accomplished sales leaders who are passionate about evangelizing the industry’s most disruptive technologies. You’re excited to exercise your modern data infrastructure expertise and communicate solution value to enterprise accounts. You also possess an in-depth understanding of the market landscape, have the ability to partner closely with sales engineers and inside sales reps, and can thrive in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.

Role and Responsibilities
Develop and execute territory account plans to achieve (ideally exceed) quota
Lead multiple customer sales cycles and effectively close new business (hunter mentality with the ability to sign new logos)
Manage and grow large, strategic enterprise accounts
Effectively partner with Sales Engineering, Inside Sales, and Field Marketing
Quickly learn our software products and be able to clearly communicate the value proposition
Develop strong relationships with key decision makers, influencers, and partners within your territory
Travel within your assigned territory

Required Skills and Experience
Proven track record of successfully selling enterprise software solutions and increasing revenue through new customer acquisition
Solution selling of a disruptive technology in the data infrastructure space
Firm understanding of the modern data infrastructure such as the open source community and the various enterprise software (business intelligence, analytics, ETL, cloud infrastructure, etc.) products
Demonstrated ability to sell to CXO or line of business, successfully emphasizing business value versus product
Strong ability to connect with customers to understand their individual business needs
B.S. degree or equivalent in a related field
Understanding of OLTP and OLAP architectures is a plus

Skills
Sales, Databases, Enterprise Software, Enterprise Sales
Compensation
$260K–$300K
0.0%–0.05%
Visa Sponsorship
Not available

What We're Building

MemSQL envisions a world of adaptable databases and flexible data workloads - your data anywhere in real time. Today, global enterprises use MemSQL as a real-time data warehouse to cost-effectively ingest data and produce industry-leading time to insight. MemSQL works as a managed service, in any cloud, or on-premises environment. For more information visit www.memsql.com.

Headquartered in San Francisco, CA with offices in Seattle, WA and Portland OR, MemSQL has raised nearly $100M from top investors including Accel Partners and Khosla Ventures among others. MemSQL is trusted by customers including Uber, Akamai, DELL/EMC, Samsung, Comcast, Kellogg, and more.

If you want to work at a company that celebrates diversity, innovation, leadership, and creativity every day, check out our openings at https://www.memsql.com/careers/

City Manager - CDMx Mexico at Shippify

Mexico, Remote · Full Time
We are not a traditional logistic company. Not even close. In fact, we are pretty much the opposite. We're flipping a multibillion dollar industry on its head so we're looking for new team members to join the rebellion.Read More

We are not a traditional logistic company. Not even close. In fact, we are pretty much the opposite. We're flipping a multibillion dollar industry on its head so we're looking for new team members to join the rebellion.

Who we are
Shippify was founded 3 years ago with the clear goal and mission to "redefine last mile logistics" We got tired of having to wait for weeks to receive our online orders; so we decided to "shake up" the traditional logistics industry and established a "new standard” based in technology and an efficient process using crowdsourced models.

Shippify focuses its operations in emerging markets - currently, we have offices and operations in Brazil, Chile, Mexico, and Ecuador. We have created opportunities and an extra source of income for more than thousands of micro-entrepreneurs, while democratizing urban logistics.

Applied
Apply to Shippify
Add a message to Shippify
Apply

Job Description

As a member of this rockstar team of hustlers, you will invade new territories and set up initial operations with lightning efficiency and seamless execution, setting in place a firm foundation that allows each new market you enter to become a new hub of Urban Logistics in your City.

You will be tasked with three critical objectives in every new market or city to launch:

First, you will gather valuable data and insight into the geographic and delivery aspects of the new place.

Second, you will identify and tap into pools of awesome delivery drivers, getting them seriously pumped about landing the best delivery service and collaborative community with us.

Finally, you will identify, recruit, and train a strong local leadership "urban" force to deliver goods and packages on demand.

WHO WE ARE LOOKING FOR

High-energy: Someone who brings a high level of enthusiasm and infectious, positive energy to the role every day.

Like meeting new People: While we are based in Brazil, and work in other remote citys, you’ll be in touch of our awesome team sharing and learning best practices.

Creative Problem-Solver: Quickly comes up with imaginative, novel and executable ideas to tackle unique and challenging problems.

A top notch communicator: A highly articulate person who understands the importance of clarity in everything they do in a business environment.
Willingness to go all-in: Thrives in a true startup environment and loves being in the trenches doing whatever it takes to win and "get it done"

Resilient Self-Starter: Takes the initiative and put themselves out there. Gets up every time circumstances knock you down.

We are looking for the “unique” over the “ideal.” What have you done that others thought was completely crazy? ... You know crazy is complement for us.
If your heart started racing and your eyes widened after reading this… we need to talk , NOW !!!

Compensation
$6K–$18K
No Equity
Applied
Apply Now
Add a message to Shippify
Apply

What We're Building

Shippify it's an innovative logistics service that connects, through technology, online and offline businesses, with a trusted and trained community of drivers; helping them deliver products under the same day and optimize their logistics.

We are backed by strategic leading venture capital & investors. Currently available in Brasil, Mexico, Chile, Ecuador. For more information and new cities, please visit www.shippify.co

items.title: SaaS Sales Manager
items.content:
SaaS Sales Manager

Company: Follow Up Boss

Who Is Follow Up Boss?

  • We’re a SaaS solution that accelerates sales for real estate teams
  • We’re a self funded, profitable company founded in 2011
  • We’re a remote company with a mostly US-based team
  • We don’t just claim to be customer-centric - we live it: https://www.facebook.com/followupboss/reviews
  • Check out our video on how we work: https://www.followupboss.com/about/

Why Would You Want To Work Here?

  • We’re a young, ambitious company who only answers to our customers
  • Opportunity to have a big impact on our growth and your career
  • No red tape or pointless meetings
  • Competitive base salary + performance bonus, health/dental insurance, company meetups, monthly perks, and 20 days paid holiday
  • See a direct impact of your work and value you create for our business and customers.

This Role Is For You If…

  • You want to sell a best in class SaaS product
  • You’re independent, self-motivated and get results
  • You’ve got the experience + skills and want to work remotely without the commute

Your qualifications:

  • A successful track record in SaaS sales management with a focus on inside sales and SMB (3+ years)
  • Passion for delivering value to the customer, maximizing their success.
  • Excellent questioning, qualification and closing skills.
  • Superb written and verbal skills (with a professional yet fun demeanor)
  • Self motivated and proactive mindset.
  • Based in the USA, quiet home office with fast internet.

Your responsibilities will include:

  • Hire, train, motivate and hold accountable all sales positions and support them in achieving and exceeding their targets.
  • Coach and mentor the team to improve sales processes and service our customers receive.
  • Ensure we’re prioritizing high value leads and bringing on best fit customers
  • Provide management and focus to drive results, set expectations, and manage performance.
  • Monitor sales activity and evaluate against goals to measure growth, opportunity and productivity.
  • Accurately report sales results to team and company
  • Lead by example and work with leads/customers directly as you build out the team

How to apply:
Apply at grnh.se/11b4dcf11

While transactional B2C display is more mature, the B2B segment today is under-served and "low tech". Criteo (NASDAQ: CRTO, $2.97B) primarily serves B2C customers. We see a similar scale opportunity in B2B.

items.content:
Sales Development Representative
Ideally based in London

Our mission is to empower people and companies to use data to do transformative things. We provide technology and services that enables our users to collect the data that they want, use that data to understand each of one of their customer’s complete user journeys, and transform their business.

Snowplow has grown significantly over the last 12 months and we are now looking for our second Sales Development Representative to help us achieve even bigger things!

The Opportunity:
Our sales function is newly formed so, as the second Sales Development Representative, there is enormous scope for a talented individual to progress quickly and have real impact on how this team is formed over the next few years. Starting with qualifying inbound leads, the role will see someone go on to work closely with our marketing function to create innovative outbound sales material.

Within 3-9 months (depending on individual progression, there’s no pressure to be a sales expert within a few weeks), you’ll also learn how to carry out demos of our product and how to guide a customer through the entire sales journey, from initial call to customer.

The environment you’ll be working in:
Our culture is as unique as our customers. Over half of our employees work remotely from all over the world so we have fostered an environment based on trust, communication and transparency. You won’t find micro-management here and everyone takes ownership of their work. Collaboration is at the core of everything we do - we work together and learn from each other.
What you’ll be doing:
Managing inbound sales queries in Salesforce
Qualifying inbound leads and carrying out initial calls with potential customers to assess how/if our product could add real value to their business
Working closely with our marketing team to start producing some outbound lead generation
Gaining deep knowledge of our product offering with a view to being able to take over some demo calls
Achieving (and hopefully exceeding) monthly and quarterly sales targets
Effectively managing your workload & prioritising tasks

What you bring to the team:
Min 1 year experience in a sales role (preferably within a data analytics/SaaS environment)
A conscientious, caring & team-oriented attitude
Drive, enthusiasm and creativity
Passion for technology and adding value to businesses through data
Fantastic communication skills, both written and verbal
Confident, calm and collected nature
Self-motivated and always looking for opportunities to learn & improve

What you’ll get in return:
A competitive package based on experience, including share options
25 days of holiday a year (plus bank holidays)
Freedom to work wherever suits you best
Two fantastic company Away-Weeks in a different European city each year (next one is Milan in May 2018!)
Work alongside a supportive and talented team
Grow and develop in a fast-moving, collaborative organisation
Enjoy fun events in and around London organised by our Cultural Work Committee
Learn to code or improve your existing skills with our Software Development Guild
Convenient location in central London (Shoreditch)
Continuous supply of Pact coffee
Regular events with the team

items.title: Business Development Associate
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=0, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=0, java=8, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=0}
items.content:
DESCRIPTION
Hubble is on a mission to find the perfect home for every company. We’ve built an online marketplace to help businesses rent, manage and share office space in London. But this is just the beginning. The commercial property sector hasn’t kept up with the needs of new companies and still works like it did 20 years ago. Our vision is to completely transform the way commercial property is transacted, managed and financed.

As a Business Development Associate you will build partnerships with flexible office providers in London and beyond. You will also support clients in uploading and updating their listings. You will have direct contact with clients, interacting in-person and through email, live chat, and phone.

You should be willing to get stuck in, with a very ‘hands-on’ approach and work autonomously in a fast-paced, constantly changing environment. You’ll need to be able to communicate with cross functional teams from marketing to engineering.

You will operate at the heart of a fast growing startup and will therefore have plenty of opportunity to learn and contribute beyond your core role.

RESPONSIBILITIES
- Source and grow relationships with flexible office providers in London and beyond.
- Pitch potential clients on the benefits of working with Hubble, and support them through the onboarding process.
- Manage day to day relationships with Hubble’s existing office clients, making sure all their space is listed on Hubble, and keeping their availability up to date.
- Regularly review online and offline sources to identify and acquire office space not currently listed on Hubble.
- Work closely with new flexible office market entrants to help them advertise, sell and manage their space using Hubble.
- Source and advise companies looking to sublet space using Hubble.
- Work closely with the product team to build disruptive technologies for the flexible office sector.
- Work closely with the sales and support team and get stuck in where required.

REQUIREMENTS
- Energetic, passionate, and driven individual who can easily collaborate with others.
- Willing to get your hands dirty and work autonomously in a fast-paced, entrepreneurial environment.
- Sensitive to varied customer personalities and needs.
- At ease when communicating with others, whether that’s via email, phone or face to face.
- Technology savvy and willing to learn new tools.
- Conscientious, with excellent attention to detail.
- Strong work ethic and sense of ownership.
- Comfortable taking initiative, suggesting improvements and making decisions independent of others.

Big plus if you have;
- Experience of the flexible office sector.
- Experience working in startup environment.

BENEFITS
We make sure everyone in the team is comfortable and has the best environment for them. We offer flexible hours, remote working and have a relaxed attitude to taking holiday - focusing only on whether work gets done. Benefits can be tweaked on an individual basis depending on what makes you most productive. Here are some of the things we offer:

- Remuneration competitive with industry and level of experience.
-Equity options.
-Macbook, peripherals and standing desk.
- Expense budget & travel.
- Noise-cancelling headphones.
- Spotify Premium or Apple Music.
- Kindle Unlimited + free technical books.
- Health & Pension.
- Cycle to Work scheme.
- Additionally, being part of Entrepreneur First, 500 startups and Seedcamp gives us (and you) access to a vibrant startup community, office hours and talks with industry experts.

ABOUT HUBBLE

Hubble is backed by top venture capital firms Entrepreneur First, Seedcamp and 500 startups, and property tech specialists Spire Ventures (PiLabs). Hubble’s investors and advisors include founders & C-level including James Caan (Dragon’s Den and serial entrepreneur), Rohan Silva (Second Home, Former Policy Advisor to the Prime Minister), Jackson Hull (Student.com, Onefinestay), Brett Akker (Zipcar, Lovespace), Jonathan Galore (Wonga, Silverlake Partners) etc.

Hubble is an equal opportunities employer. We are a diverse bunch of people who are committed to maintaining a welcoming culture of inclusion and equality. We encourage applications from anyone that meets the requirements for the role.
